content.raw:
Jon, thank you. The sensor\_config.yaml now passes the compliance check. I can also reach your Dockerhub image. A minor issue is that the dockerhub\_image.txt file should begin with a lowercase “d”, but since we are not going to pull this image anyway I don’t think it’s worth worrying about. I’m going to approve and merge this request.

Thanks!
content.html:
Jon, thank you. The sensor_config.yaml now passes the compliance check. I can also reach your Dockerhub image. A minor issue is that the dockerhub_image.txt file should begin with a lowercase “d”, but since we are not going to pull this image anyway I don’t think it’s worth worrying about. I’m going to approve and merge this request.

Thanks!
